The dress has a shimmer sheerness appearance that customers like, though some mention it's super see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great New Year’s Eve dress!
items.body: The dress is stunning it fits perfectly, great quality for the price. Really like the shimmer sheerness appearance, it flows beautifully. Read more
items.author: nothinglikesweet_t

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable dress that looks like a million bucks
items.body: 5’1” 105 lbs, XS fit perfect. Absolutely gorgeous. 5 stars! This dress is perfect for summer evenings. The fabric is stretchy and lightweight, but not sheer enough to see through. I have a large bust and the top stayed in place without any fabric adhesive or constant fidgeting. Read more
items.author: Kaitlyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Very well made. The sheer material is so soft. Fabric is light weight. Fits perfectly. They style is absolutely amazing. The dress is not see through but it is breathable material. Read more
items.author: CarrieZema

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Dress!! <33
items.body: Helloo! I usually dont write reviews but this dress was amazing for the price!! The fabric is VERY stretchy which is good! The outside is a little rough due to the glitter but the inside is softer or rather smoother! I am 5'4" and without heels the bottom of the dress touched the floor however not by very much! I will say about the dress btw it isn't like super sheer but I did notice if light was coming from like up under it (ex: light pointed at you whilst your legs are crossed) the material is pretty sheer so I would definitely be careful just incase what you wear but honestly this dress is such a steal! I am 5'4" 190lbs My waist is about 36-37" My bust is about 50"? I believe? Last time I measured it was so we will go with that! Honestly though, you should have no problem! Also if your a bigger girlie the glitter and the slight rutches it has (or you can make them yourself) is forgiving!! It is a very stunning dress overall! Again, be careful though as the material isnt SUPER thick and is a little sheer, but I find that stretchy dresses tend to be like that sometimes Read more
items.author: Brooke Ward

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple beauty
items.body: I really don’t have a single complaint about this dress. It is on the thinner side and could possibly be a little see-through. The transparency is not bad though, if you are wearing undergarments you will be fine. The fit is very comfortable, if you want a more snug fit then size down because the dress has a lot of stretch to it. I am 5’5” 175-180lbs and a large would have been perfect but I purposely sized up because I was bloated. I am definitely getting the red one in large for my “feeling skinny” days lol. Read more
items.author: Shay F.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars everything
items.body: beautiful style dress . perfet fitting . dress quality is fantastic , Read more
items.author: Mayra

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: The dress was really cute overall it just ran a bit big Read more
items.author: dia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sparkly, Stretchy and comfortable
items.body: I ordered this for my upcoming birthday and i love it. it’s true to size. for reference i am 5”4 130lbs and i got a small. it’s stretchy and just pulls over your body. i love the strapless look and it really is sparkly like the photos. the leg slit is flattering. it could be a little longer but i like that it doesn’t drag. hope this helps :) Read more
items.author: Bern

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Maxi Split Bodycon High Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Maxi Split Bodycon High Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
